mapper.select: SELECT created_at, count, item_id, user_id, (select name from item where cart.item_id = item.item_id) as product_name, (select price from item where cart.item_id = item.item_id) as product_price -- (select product_image from item where cart.id = item.id) as product_image from cart where user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: insert into cart (item_id, created_at, count, user_id) values (#{item_id}, sysdate(), 1, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as item_count FROM cart WHERE user_id = 1
